column4: damn I just realized google chrome is spyware.. just when I was getting to like it.  How disappointing.

yeah it's spyware.  according to wikipedia spyware is :  Software that secretly monitors the user's behavior... Spyware programs can collect various types of personal information, such as Internet surfing habit, sites that have been visited...
No kidding, here's what I found also: http://www.favbrowser.com/google-chrome-spyware-confirmed/
